creditline: Gift of Helen M. King in memory of Allen S. King
description: creamer decorated with 6 cartouches on body 4 containing high relief floral sprays and 2 with incised seals; organic handle; long spout
markings: \'SEMPER IDEM [on a belt encircling a dragon holding a cross]\', in central cartouche on each side of body; \'666/8\', incised, on bottom; other stamps on neck, near handle
title: Creamer, from a Tea and Coffee Service
